mention.text: 00012 # 10.1038 #nrmicro 2386 Microbial production of recalcitrant dissolved organic matter : long-term carbon storage in the global ocean The biological pump
a process whereby CO2 in the upper ocean is fixed by primary producers and transported to the deep ocean as sinking biogenic particles or as dissolved organic matter
recalcitrant dissolved organic matter : long-term carbon storage in the global ocean The biological pump
The fate of most of this exported material
remineralization to CO2 , which accumulates in deep waters until it is eventually ventilated again at the sea surface
